long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A toolbar addon for Reaction Gifs. Shows both the current front page of r/reactiongif and an archive of commonly used gifs. Just click the one you want, and it copies to your clipboard for easy posting! A simple way to seem like an internet wizard. Example: http://gif.openrobot.net/Agci8.gif
